   var localStorageSupport = (function () {
            var testKey = 'testKey', storageName = 'localStorage', storage;
            try {
            storage = window.localStorage;
            storage.setItem(testKey, '1');
            storage.removeItem(testKey);
            return storageName in window &amp;&amp; window[storageName];
        } catch (error) {
            return false;
        }
        }());
        if (!localStorageSupport) {
            window.localStorage = {
                _data       : {},
                setItem     : function(id, val) { return this._data[id] = String(val); },
                getItem     : function(id) { return this._data.hasOwnProperty(id) ? this._data[id] : undefined; },
                removeItem  : function(id) { return delete this._data[id]; },
                clear       : function() { return this._data = {}; }
            };
        }
  </script>

      <h1>
       The Watchers Book 1: Knight of Light
      </h1>
      <div class="meta">
       <span>
        3 Part Story
       </span>
       <span data-placement="bottom" data-toggle="tooltip" title="7049 Reads">
        7K Reads
       </span>
       <span data-placement="bottom" data-toggle="tooltip" title="287 Votes">
        287 Votes
       </span>
      </div>
      <div class="author-info clearfix">
       <a class="avatar avatar-md pull-left on-navigate" href="/user/DeirdraEden">
        <img alt="Author Deirdra Eden" height="48" src="https://a.wattpad.com/useravatar/DeirdraEden.128.151467.jpg" width="48"/>
       </a>
       <strong>
        By
        <a class="on-navigate" href="/user/DeirdraEden">
         DeirdraEden
        </a>
       </strong>
       <small data-placement="top" data-toggle="tooltip" title="First published: June 11, 2014">
        <span class="hidden-xs">
         Ongoing -
        </span>
        Updated 4 months ago
       </small>
      </div>

    <div class="container">
     <div class="row">
      <main class="col-sm-12 col-md-8">
       <div class="panel panel-basic">
        <div class="story-controls" role="menu">
         <a class="btn btn-primary btn-md btn-inline on-story-navigate" href="/54182590-the-watchers-book-1-knight-of-light-chapter-one">
          Start Reading
         </a>
         <div class="button-group relative inline-block">
          <div class="btn-group">
           <button class="btn btn-default btn-md btn-story-lists" data-story-id="17650871">
            My Lists
           </button>
           <button class="btn btn-default btn-md btn-library" data-story-id="17650871">
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-plus fa-wp-mediumgrey " style="font-size:16px;">
            </span>
           </button>
          </div>
          <div class="triangle">
          </div>
          <div class="dropdown-menu dropdown-menu-right add-to-library">
           <ul class="lists-menu" data-story-id="17650871">
           </ul>
           <div class="input-group">
            <label class="sr-only" for="new-reading-list">
             New Reading List
            </label>
            <input class="form-control list-name" id="new-reading-list" placeholder="Add New Reading List" type="text"/>
            <span class="input-group-btn">
             <button class="btn btn-primary on-create-list" data-story-id="17650871" type="button">
              +
             </button>
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <pre class="description">
         The Watchers are supernatural beings in human form, charged with protecting mankind from the armies of darkness. Unfortunately, some of these Watchers go bad. 
    
    Deirdra Edens The Watchers Series is written in a traditional fairytale style with a young girls discovery of incredible, but dangerous powers within herself, a cast of humorous side-kicks, a quest for greater self-discovery and purpose, and villains of epic proportions.
    
    Watch the amazing Knight of Light book trailer http://youtu.be/m-RxVN_FKL8
    
    In England, 1270 A.D., Auriella flees her village after being accused of witchcraft and sentenced to death. Pursued by nightmarish creatures, she struggles to accept the truth about her humanity. 
    
    Filled with fairies, dwarves, pixies, dragons, and epic villains, Knight of Light is an enthralling tale that will capture the imaginations of readers young and old.
        </pre>
        <div class="tags">
         <a class="tag category on-navigate" href="/stories/teen-fiction">
          Teen Fiction
         </a>

          christian
         </a>

          dwarf
         </a>
         <a class="on-showmore-tags" href="#">
          + 12 More
         </a>
        </div>

             </a>
            </li>
            <li data-section="parts">
             <a class="on-tab-nav" href="#">
              Table of Contents
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="hidden-md hidden-lg" data-section="details">
             <a class="on-tab-nav" href="#">
              Details
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </nav>
         </header>
         <div class="clearfix" id="tab-content">
          <div class="comments">
           <div class="show-more hidden center-text">

N=new l;E(a,p),p.prototype._state=0,p.prototype.resolve=function(t){this.become(s(t))},p.prototype.reject=function(t){this.resolved||this.become(new m(t))},p.prototype.join=function(){if(!this.resolved)return this;for(var t=this;void 0!==t.handler;)if(t=t.handler,t===this)return this.handler=j();return t},p.prototype.run=function(){var t=this.consumers,e=this.join();this.consumers=void 0;for(var n=0;n&lt;t.length;++n)e.when(t[n])},p.prototype.become=function(t){this.resolved||(this.resolved=!0,this.handler=t,void 0!==this.consumers&amp;&amp;H.enqueue(this),void 0!==this.context&amp;&amp;t._report(this.context))},p.prototype.when=function(t){this.resolved?H.enqueue(new x(t,this.handler)):void 0===this.consumers?this.consumers=[t]:this.consumers.push(t)},p.prototype.notify=function(t){this.resolved||H.enqueue(new g(t,this))},p.prototype.fail=function(t){var e="undefined"==typeof t?this.context:t;this.resolved&amp;&amp;this.handler.join().fail(e)},p.prototype._report=function(t){this.resolved&amp;&amp;this.handler.join()._report(t)},p.prototype._unreport=function(){this.resolved&amp;&amp;this.handler.join()._unreport()},E(a,d),d.prototype._report=function(t){this.join()._report(t)},d.prototype._unreport=function(){this.join()._unreport()},E(d,y),y.prototype.when=function(t){H.enqueue(new x(t,this))},E(p,v),E(a,w),w.prototype._state=1,w.prototype.fold=function(t,e,n,o){Q(t,e,this,n,o)},w.prototype.when=function(t){R(t.fulfilled,this,t.receiver,t.resolver)};var F=0;E(a,m),m.prototype._state=-1,m.prototype.fold=function(t,e,n,o){o.become(this)},m.prototype.when=function(t){"function"==typeof t.rejected&amp;&amp;this._unreport(),R(t.rejected,this,t.receiver,t.resolver)},m.prototype._report=function(t){H.afterQueue(new b(this,t))},m.prototype._unreport=function(){this.handled=!0,H.afterQueue(new _(this))},m.prototype.fail=function(t){e.onFatalRejection(this,void 0===t?this.context:t)},b.prototype.run=function(){this.rejection.handled||(this.rejection.reported=!0,e.onPotentiallyUnhandledRejection(this.rejection,this.context))},_.prototype.run=function(){this.rejection.reported&amp;&amp;e.onPotentiallyUnhandledRejectionHandled(this.rejection)},e.createContext=e.enterContext=e.exitContext=e.onPotentiallyUnhandledRejection=e.onPotentiallyUnhandledRejectionHandled=e.onFatalRejection=S;var W=new a,J=new e(a,W);return x.prototype.run=function(){this.handler.join().when(this.continuation)},g.prototype.run=function(){var t=this.handler.consumers;if(void 0!==t)for(var e,n=0;n&lt;t.length;++n)e=t[n],T(e.progress,this.value,this.handler,e.receiver,e.resolver)},P.prototype.run=function(){function t(t){o.resolve(t)}function e(t){o.reject(t)}function n(t){o.notify(t)}var o=this.resolver;C(this._then,this.thenable,t,e,n)},e}})}("function"==typeof t&amp;&amp;t.amd?t:function(t){n.exports=t()})},{}],8:[function(e,n){!function(t){"use strict";t(function(t){var e,n,o,i;e=t;try{n=e("vertx"),o=function(t,e){return n.setTimer(e,t)},i=n.cancelTimer}catch(r){o=function(t,e){return setTimeout(t,e)},i=function(t){return clearTimeout(t)}}return{set:o,clear:i}})}("function"==typeof t&amp;&amp;t.amd?t:function(t){n.exports=t(e)})},{}]},{},[1])(1)});
//# sourceMappingURL=/js/promise.min.js.map
  </script>
  <script>
   var wp = window.wattpad || {};
        wp.utils = {};
        wp.app_id = 2582347323;
  </script>
  <script src="//a.wattpad.com/js/desktop-web-requirements.min.js?v=7c685a5" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script>
   moment.locale('en_US');
  </script>
  <script src="//a.wattpad.com/js/desktop-web.min.js?v=38fc698" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.mobileApp=window.mobileApp||{},window.mobileApp.appStart=function(e){"use strict";"undefined"==typeof e.dependencyFailure||e.dependencyFailure?(e.onerror=null,e.document.cookie="mw-no=true; path=/",e.location.reload(!0)):$(function(){$.ajaxSetup({beforeSend:function(e,t){/api|apiv2|api\/v3|v4/.test(t.url)&amp;&amp;e.setRequestHeader("Authorization",app.get("api-key-web"))}}),"ontouchstart"in e||$("body").addClass("touchDisabled"),e.app.start({pushState:!0})})},window.mobileApp.appStart(window);
//# sourceMappingURL=/js/desktop-web-start.min.js.map
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   !function(a,b,c,d,e,f,g){a.wpAnalytics=e,a[e]=a[e]||[],
        a[e].push=function(){
          null!==arguments[arguments.length-1]&amp;&amp;"object"==typeof arguments[arguments.length-1]
            ?arguments[arguments.length-1].ts=1*new Date
            :Array.prototype.push.call(arguments,{ts:1*new Date}),
            Array.prototype.push.call(this,arguments)
        },f=b.createElement(c),g=b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0],
        f.async=1,f.src=d,g.parentNode.insertBefore(f,g)
      }(window,window.document,"script","//a.wattpad.com/js/tracker.js?v=a93afee","te");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.te.push('create', 'desktop-web', null, window.wattpad.user ? window.wattpad.user.id : null);
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function() {
        var referer = undefined;

      referer &amp;&amp; !referer.match(/\.optimizely.com/) &amp;&amp; !referer.match(/\.optimizelyedit.com/) &amp;&amp; this.top.location !== this.location &amp;&amp; (this.top.location = this.location);

        var teSend = function( eventType, referer, page, filter, storyid ) {
          if ( window.te === undefined ) {
            return;
          }

          if ( page === 'story' || !isNaN( page ) ) {
            // is a story view event, set page &amp; story id
            if ( !isNaN( page ) ) {
              storyid = parseInt( page );
              page = 'story';
            } else {
              storyid = parseInt( storyid );
            }

            window.te.push( 'event', 'wattpad', null, null, eventType, { 'referer': referer, 'page': page, 'storyid': storyid } );
            return;
          }

          // is a search event
          window.te.push( 'event', 'wattpad', null, null, eventType, { 'referer': referer, 'page': page, 'filter': filter } );
        };

        var trackNavigation = function() {
          var parsedUrl = document.URL.match( /^(?:https?\:\/\/)?(?:www\.)?(?:[^\/?#]+)(?:\/)([a-zA-z0-9]+)(?:\/)?([-a-zA-Z]+|[0-9]+)?(?:[\/]?[\?]?(?:view=|q=))?([a-zA-Z\+]+)?/i ),
            page = parsedUrl[1],
            view = parsedUrl[2],
            storyid = parsedUrl[2],
            filter = parsedUrl[3];

          if ( page.indexOf( 'stories' ) &gt; -1 &amp;&amp; view !== undefined ) {
            // view holds the category
            page = view;
          }

          if ( referer === undefined ) {
            // direct start event
            teSend( 'start', 'direct', page, filter, storyid );
            return;
          }

          var pagereferer = document.URL.match( /^https?\:\/\/(?:www\.)?([^\/?#]+)(?:[\/?#]|$)/i )[1];
          if ( pagereferer.indexOf( 'wattpad' ) &gt; -1 ) {
            // on-site event
            teSend( 'navigate', null, page, filter, storyid );
          }
          else {
            // start referral event
            teSend( 'start', pagereferer, page, filter, storyid );
          }
        };
      trackNavigation();
    })();
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
